scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --force major
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --force minor
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version --force patch
scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push origin --tags
